author: Becca Bleznak
title: David Joyner Net Worth 2024, Age, Height, Weight, Biography, Wiki and Career Details
text:
David Joyner Real Name/Full Name David Eugene Joyner Nick Name/Celebrated Name: David Joyner Birth Place: Decatur, Illinois, United States Date Of Birth/Birthday: 4 July 1963 Age/How Old: 61 years old Height/How Tall: In Centimetres 178 cm
In Feet and Inches – 5′ 8″ Weight: In Kilograms – 70 Kg
In Pounds – 154.3 lbs Eye Color: Dark Brown Hair Color: Bald Parents Name: Father –Roscoe Joyner
Mother –Mary Joyner Siblings: N/A School: MacArthur High School College: ITT technical Institute, Indianapolis Religion: Christian Nationality: American Zodiac Sign: Cancer Gender: Male Sexual Orientation: Straight Marital Status: Single Girlfriend: N/A Wife/Spouse Name: N/A Kids/Children Name: Bobby Joyner Profession: Actor Net Worth: $2 Million Last Updated: September 2024 The 90’s kids wholly admired David Eugene Joyner for playing the character of Barney. The children’s show Barney and Friends starred him as a substantial purple dinosaur. He also voiced the character along with Duncan Brannan and Tim Dever. He was a part of both the series Barney and Friends and its sequel Barney and the Backyard Gang. Hip Hop Harry starred him as the lead.
Well, how well do you know about David Joyner? If not much, we have compiled all you need to know about David Joyner’s net worth in 2024, his age, height, weight, wife, kids, biography and complete details about his life. Well, if you’re all set, here is what we know about David Joyner to date.
Biography and Early Life David was the son of Roscoe Joyner and Mary Joyner. They lived in Decatur, Illinois, the U.S. There, he completed his primary education from the MacArthur High School. He then attended the ITT Technical Institute of Indianapolis, Indiana State. He graduated with an Electronics Engineer from there.
Following six years, David Joyner worked as a software analyst for Texas Instruments. In 1981, he earned money by becoming the Mannequin Man at various shopping centers. He now works as a Tantric Sex Therapist in the town. He believes Tantric is not about intercourse but the energy of love and affection.
Age, Height, Weight & Body Measurement So, how old is David Joyner in 2024 and what is his height and weight? Well, David Joyner’s age is 61 years old as of today’s date 19th September 2024 having been born on 4 July 1963. Though, he is 5′ 8″ in feet and inches and 178 cm in Centimetres tall, he weighs about 154.3lbs in Pound and 70kg in Kilograms.
Education David Joyner was born and brought up in Decatur and completed his high school at MacArthur High School. Then he went to the ITT Technical Institute of Indianapolis, Indiana State. He graduated with an Electronics Engineer from there. Following six years, David Joyner worked as a software analyst for Texas Instruments.
Personal Life: Dating, Girlfriends, Wife, Kids David Joyner had always been reluctant to come out with his personal life. Not much except him dating a woman is known. He has never made a public appearance with any women. Neither has he ever spoken about his likes and dislikes about women, nor is he involved with anybody at the moment. He has a son, Bobby Joyner, who is also a famous actor.
Is David Joyner Gay? No, David Joyner is not gay. There has been no rumor or news of him being romantically involved with males. He has been very personal about his dating life.
Professional Career After finishing his engineering degree and working for six years at Texas Instruments, he decided to quit this job and pursue his entertainment career in 1990. Because while working in TI, he also used to do talk shows and performed at clubs, malls, etc., in the evenings. In 1988, he also started to Drive motivational talks. At “The Dallas Young Actors Studio and performance center, he became an acting coach.
While he was working as an Assistant director in 1990, he met Shirley Abrams, who cast him as Barney in the children’s show. He also met Mary Grady, who is now his best friend. He started as Barney in 1991 and hence traveled to a lot of places during the show. A lot of people of all age groups admired him for his work. Apart from the show, he also worked in movies like Barney in Outer Space and Barney’s Great Adventure in 1998.
In 2001, however, he left the show and went to LA to try his luck in the acting career without the costume. In 2002, while he was making a guest appearance at a show, he was approached by the producer, Claude Brooks, who was working on the upcoming show, ‘Hip Hop Harry’. The producer offered him the lead role of Hip Hop Harry. He loved this job since it involved spreading positivity and joy to children and adults.
He also starred in movies like ‘I’ll be there for you in 2006, ‘All lies on me’ in 2007,’ The adventures of Umbweki’ in 2009, and Controlled in 2010. He has also worked for few episodes on TV shows like General Hospital, Today, Crossing Jordan; What Would You Do?, According to Him +Her, Shameless, Veep, Unknown Encounter, etc.
Awards David Joyner has appeared on a lot of TV series and shows. The masses have greatly admired him for all of his work. He hasn’t received any significant awards yet. But his show, “Barney and Friends,” was awarded the Daytime Creative Arts Emmy Award for Outstanding Live and Direct to tape Sound Mixing.
Net Worth, Salary & Earnings of David Joyner in 2024 David Joyner Net Worth David has worked in a number of TV shows in versatile roles. He has also done live shows and stage performances; apart from his monthly salary, he also used to receive some incentives. He is now a Tantric sex therapist. All this has added to his net worth of $2 Million as of last estimated in 2024.
Some Interesting Facts You Need To Know The role of Barney was a challenge for David because his costume weighed 70 pounds, and it would become as hot as 120 degrees inside of the outfit. David is now a Tantric therapist. He works only for female clients, and his fees for a 304-hour long session is $350. David Joyner is a positive and talented person who is known for his comic characters in TV shows such as Barney & Friends and Hip Hop Harry. He has a fun spirit and hence became a motivational speaker and a therapist apart from an actor. He is a very humble man and loves his work, and is entirely dedicated to his profession.

author: Urasandi
title: #123 Vitoria-Gasteiz retira las banderas judías del mercado medieval por el genocidio en Palestina
text:
Portada
mis comunidades
otras secciones
[#20](c20#c-20) ...pero si la esvástica es un símbolo budista y tal y pascual...
[#30](c30#c-30) la cruz gamada no apareció en nuestra cultura hasta hace dos días por el pintor austríaco del bigote.
La estrella de David es algo con significado en nuestra cultura desde mucho antes de israel
[#114](c114#c-114) Ah, que hablas de todo un país para apoyar una generalización...
Lo siento por los llorones de "La Federación de Comunidades Judías de España", no he visto ningún comunicado de ellos, alegando de que se está cometiendo una carnicería en Gaza y de que ésta debe terminara ya.
Por lo tanto, este comunicado que han lanzado sobre el tema del trapajo de colores, es una simple pataleta y lloriqueo nada más.
Por mi parte, bien hecho por Vitoria en retirar todas las banderas judías de sus lugares.
[#38](c38#c-38) Tan fácil como ir a su web y encontrar las noticias que ellos mismos enlazan… https://www.fcje.org/depto-de-comunicacion
El primer enlace, por ejemplo, una noticia del presidente de la asociación sobre el antisemitismo, empieza así:
Convencido, asegura: "Israel busca la paz". Sabe mejor que nadie el sentir de los judíos, pues preside la Federación de Comunidades Judías de España, y, por eso, extiende esa manifestación al resto de fieles. Isaac Benzaquén no tiene reparos en mostrar su visión sobre el conflicto en Gaza: "Israel no ataca a los palestinos, Israel ataca a los terroristas de Hamás por lo que hicieron el 7 de octubre y, lamentablemente, hay muertes que no son justas ni necesarias".
Decenas de miles de niños muertos, otros tantos más huérfanos, bebes recién nacidos asesinados, bombardeados, dejados morir en hospitales… y el presidente de la asociación es tan miserable como para hacer esas declaraciones.
[#98](c98#c-98) Me da igual que me da lo mismo...si va de ofendidito hace el ridiculo
[#92](c92#c-92) Yo tampoco te he escuchado a ti condenar la violencia étnica y religiosa en Etiopía, me imagino entonces que la apoyas, ¿no?
[#91](c91#c-91) Bueno, como tú tampoco tienes ningún comunicado condenando la violencia étnica y religiosa en Etiopía, me imagino entonces que la apoyas, ¿no?
[#113](c113#c-113) que tú sepas, por eso te pedía si sabias si lo habían hecho. De todas formas, seguro que entiendes la diferencia entre una asociación publica y una persona anónima… deduzco que mezclas ambas cosas por maldad, porque no creo que seas idiota.
[#55](c55#c-55) Como separar la izquierda abertzale de ETA
[#54](c54#c-54) Es en Vitoria, vascos de 2024, no españoles
[#62](c62#c-62) Tu crees que alguien con sentido común apoyaríala violencia etnica y religiosa de Etiopia? Pues lo mismo con Israel.
Si esta asociación judía no entiende por qué se retiran esas banderolas con la estrella de david, dejan bastante claro que no tienen mucho sentido común y de qué palo van, por lo menos en este momento.
[#100](c100#c-100) Mejor eso a que se los quemen de noche.
[#49](c49#c-49) una cosa son los simbolos judios y otra cosa es la bandera de un estado...
puedes aborrecer el gobierno de españa ( o cualquier otro pais ) sin tener nada en contra de sus gentes...
puedes odiar a Putin y sus acciones, pero eso no te hace odiar a todos los rusos...
hay que entender qué significa caad simbolo, no es lo mismo una cruz cristiana que un estado cristiano...
[#85](c85#c-85) Tu argumento legitimaría, por ejemplo, que los árabes traten de reconquistar Al Andalus por la fuerza con la excusa de que lo están recuperando. O que Italia trate de conquistar España. Son hechos históricos pasados y acabados. Los palestinos, en el peor de los casos, llevan 2000 años allí - a menos que pienses en serio que entre el siglo I y el siglo VII allí no viviera nadie, en cuyo caso sólo llevarían allí 1300 años. ¿No les otorga eso ningún derecho? Es ridículo.
[#104](c104#c-104) Pues yo creo que el error está en creer que son "muchas" las que están protestando ... si las comparamos con las que apoyan abiertamente y con las que se quedan impasibles ante la matanza y el saqueo.
A ver si algún alma caritativa nos enlaza alguna encuesta independiente y nos saca de dudas.

author: globo.com
title: Papa Francisco crismou campeão do mundo que descobriu tumor e se curou
text: Atualmente no Atlético de Madrid, Ángel Correa tem uma história de superação e fé com Jorge Mario Bergoglio, o Papa Francisco (1935-2025), que morreu na última segunda-feira (21). Quando tinha 14 anos, o jogador de futebol foi crismado pelo pontífice ainda quando ele era um cardeal do bairro de Boedo, em Buenos Aires, Argentina. Continuar lendo

author: @askanews_ita
title: Errani-Vavassori nella storia del tennis: vincono il torneo di doppio misto agli US Open 2024
text:
Roma, 5 set. (askanews) – Sara Errani e Andrea Vavassori vincono il torneo di doppio misto agli US Open 2024: si tratta del primo storico titolo Slam nella disciplina per una coppia tutta italiana. La romagnola e il torinese battono in finale il duo americano Townsend/Young con il punteggio di 7-6 7-5 in 1h28′. Per Errani si tratta del 6° successo a livello Major nel doppio (i primi cinque nel femminile in coppia con Roberta Vinci), il primo a distanza di dieci anni. Per Vavassori il primo in assoluto dopo le finali perse nel maschile a Melbourne e a Parigi in questa stagione in coppia con Simone Bolelli. Dopo aver annullato un match point nel super tiebreak contro Galloway/Rogers all’esordio, Errani/Vavassori non hanno più perso un set dagli ottavi in poi regolando, in ordine McDonald/Mateas, Hsieh/Zielinsli, Grant/Kovacevic e infine Townsend/Young. (Foto X Us Open)
[Battuti gli statunitensi Townsend-Young 7-6, 7-5|PN_20240905_00134|gn00 ma00 in02|https://askanews.it/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Errani-Vavassori-vincono-il-torneo-di-doppio-misto-agli-US-Open.jpg|05/09/2024 22:47:44|Errani-Vavassori vincono il torneo di doppio misto agli US Open 2024|Tennis|Sport]

author: VNExplorer
title: Good News For People Of Bihar, Uttar Pradesh; Indian Railways Announces Holi Special Trains
text:
Good News For People Of Bihar, Uttar Pradesh; Indian Railways Announces Holi Special Trains
Amid the festive rush and increasing demand of train tickets ahead of Holi, the Northern Railways has announced to run several Holi special trains to connect the northern belt of India. Northern Railways has provided an extensive list of Holi Special trains being run to various destinations. Check the list below:
1. Anand Vihar Terminal – Patna Jn.- Anand Vihar Terminal Special (04066/04065): Running from Anand Vihar Terminal to Patna Jn. and back, with stops at Govindpuri, Prayagraj Jn., Varanasi, Pt. Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Jn., Danapur, and Patna Jn.
2. Delhi Jn.- Barauni- Delhi jn. Reversed Special (04062/04061): Running between Delhi Jn. and Barauni with stops at Aligarh, Tundla, Etawah, Kanpur Central, Lucknow, Gonda, Basti, Gorakhpur, Siwan, Chhapra, and Hajipur.
3. Chandigarh- Gorakhpur- Chandigarh Reversed Special (04518/04517): Operating between Chandigarh and Gorakhpur with stops at Ambala Cantt., Saharanpur, Moradabad, Bareilly, Lucknow, and Gonda.
4. Anand Vihar Terminal-Jaynagar – Anand Vihar Terminal Reversed Special (04060/04059): Running between Anand Vihar Terminal and Jaynagar with stops at Moradabad, Bareily, Lucknow, Varanasi, Pt. Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Jn., Buxar, Ara, Danapur, Patliputra, and Hajipur.
5. Anand Vihar Terminal- Saharsa Jn – Anand Vihar Terminal Special (01664/01663): Operating between Anand Vihar Terminal and Saharsa Jn. with stops at Hapur, Moradabad, Bareilly, Hardoi, Lucknow, Gorakhpur Jn., Deoria Sadar, Siwan Jn., Chhapra, and Hajipur Jn.
6. Anand Vihar Terminal- Jogbani – Anand Vihar Terminal Special (04010/04009): Running between Anand Vihar Terminal and Jogbani with stops at Ghaziabad, Moradabad, Chandausi Jn., Bareilly Cantt, Sitapur, Gonda Jn., Basti, Gorakhpur, Deoria Sadar, Siwan Jn., Chhapra, Sonpur Jn., Hajipur Jn., Shahpur Patoree, Barauni Jn., Begu Sarai, Khagaria Jn., Naugachia, Katihar Jn., Purnea, Arariya Court, Arariya, and Jogbani.
7. Delhi Jn.- Darbhanga – Delhi Jn.- Special (04068/04067): Running between Delhi Jn. and Darbhanga with stops at Moradabad, Bareilly, Lucknow, Gorakhpur Jn., Narkatiaganj, Raxaul, Bairgania, Sitamarhi, and Darbhanga.
8. New Delhi.- Sitamarhi- New Delhi.- Special (04004/04003): Operating between New Delhi and Sitamarhi with stops at Moradabad, Bareilly, Shahjehanpur, Sitapur, Gonda, Basti, Gorakhpur Jn., Narkatiaganj, Raxaul, Bairgania, Sitamarhi.
9. Chhapra – Anand Vihar T.- Chhapra Special (05115/05116): Running between Chhapra and Anand Vihar Terminal with stops at Siwan, Deoria, Gorakhpur, Khalilabad, Basti, Gonda, Burhwal, Sitapur Jn., Bareilly Jn., Moradabad, and Anand Vihar T.
10. Gorakhpur – Anand Vihar Terminal.- Gorakhpur Special (05023/05024): Operating between Gorakhpur and Anand Vihar Terminal with stops at Khalilabad, Basti, Gonda, Burhwal, Sitapur Jn., Bareilly, Moradabad, Ghaziabad, and Anand Vihar Terminal.
The other trains include:
05097/05098 Tanakpur – Daurai – Tanakpur Special 05047/05048 Banaras – Anand Vihar Terminal – Banaras Special 05053/05054 Gorakhpur – Bandra Terminus – Gorakhpur Special 05005/05006 Gorakhpur – Amritsar – Gorakhpur Special 05049/05050 Chhapra – Amritsar – Chhapra Special 05012/05011 Chhapra – Gomti Nagar – Chhapra Special 05045/05046 Lalkuan-Rajkot – Lalkuan Special 05193/05194 – Chhapra – Panvel – Chhapra Special 04145/04146-Prayagraj – Anand Vihar (T) – Prayagraj Special 09523/09524 Okha- Delhi Sarai Rohilla-Okha Superfast special 09525/09526 Hapa -Naharlagun -Hapa Special 09183/09184 Mumbai Central -Banaras -Mumbai Central Special 09111/09112 Mumbai Central -Banaras -Mumbai Central Special 09195/09196 Vadodara -Mau – Vadodara Special 09061/09062 Valsad – Barauni Jn.–Valsad Special 09417/09418 Ahmedabad-Danapur-Ahmedabad Special Every year during the festive seasons of Holi, Diwali and Chhath, the demand for trains grows drastically, especially in Northern India. To deal with this, Railways introduces various special trains to clear the festive rush.

author: Wilson Moore World-Herald staff writer
title: 'We're really here': Omaha basketball savors first NCAA trip, eyes history
text:
PROVIDENCE, R.I. — Marquel Sutton shuffled his feet along the center court logo, looking down at the capitalized white lettering underneath him.
It was the sight Sutton had anticipated, and it was finally in his vision as Omaha took the court for its open practice in front of a smattering of spectators at Amica Mutual Pavilion.
Reality didn’t set in on the Mavericks’ star forward in the days leading up to their first NCAA tournament game. It wouldn’t, he expected, until he saw the logo, until MARCH MADNESS in block letters was staring back at him from the floor.
For Sutton and the Mavs, the tournament experience has been twofold. They want to enjoy the moment and appreciate that they’re in a setting most of the college basketball world doesn’t get to experience. Staying relaxed and having fun feeds into their primary purpose: playing the same brand of basketball that defined their romp through the Summit League, with the possibility of stunning No. 2 seed St. John’s the reward at the end of Thursday night.
“Just enjoy it,” Sutton said. “Enjoy this experience. Just don’t overthink the game. It’s just stay in the moment and be present and don’t overthink it. We’ve been doing this all our lives. It’s just basketball, so just go out there and have fun and just play hard. That’s the main thing.”
Different flashpoints stick out for different players within the whirlwind of the past four days. For Lance Waddles, it was on Selection Sunday when he saw Omaha’s name flash on the television and it became official that the Mavericks were dancing for the first time in program history.
Isaac Ondekane understood the glitz and glamor of the tournament when the team had a police escort while on the bus. Tony Osburn had a surreal moment when he walked past Arkansas coach John Calipari and fist-bumped assistant coach Tyler Ulis, who he watched play for Kentucky as a kid.
The little moments are part of a gradual process as the game draws nearer, drops in the bucket as Omaha’s name written in the bracket evolves into tangibility.
“It’s still weird, though,” Waddles said. “Every step it gets more and more real. It’s like, damn, we’re really here.”
The Mavericks were loose as they practiced with close to 30 hours remaining until the scheduled tipoff against the Red Storm. Point guard JJ White smiled as he barked at Sebastian Perry at the end of a shooting competition. White’s black-clad team made up of starters had hit 10 3-pointers before Perry’s squad of backups dressed in white, and White grabbed the redshirt freshman as they switched sides.
As White closed practice by shooting free throws, the rest of the team gathered around him, laughing and yelling to simulate the chaos of late-game pressure foul shots.
Omaha coach Chris Crutchfield blew his whistle repeatedly as White went through his pre-shot routine. Forward Kamryn Thomas stood under the basket and waved his arms. Guard Ja’Sean Glover stood inches from White, his head pointed forward toward him as White missed the first and made the second free throw.
“Realizing that this is not forever, so each and every moment that you have with your teammates and your coaches, when you look back at it, it’s like it’s really an important moment,” Ondekane said. “So that’s really what I’ve been trying to pay attention to. Just the little moments of laughing with each other.”
Running parallel to the fun and light-heartedness is an understanding of what it will take to beat the red-hot Red Storm. The Omaha coaching staff began preparation shortly after the Mavs won the Summit League tournament, knowing St. John’s was one of five or six teams they could see in the tournament.
As it became clear in the 48 hours before the bracket was revealed that their opponent would be either Michigan State or St. John’s, the focus narrowed. By Monday morning, the players had learned the game plan.
Now it’s all in front of the Mavericks, even as numbers and history say a win is deeply unlikely. Omaha has nothing to lose against the favored Red Storm and a place in March Madness lore to gain. The team has reflected that dynamic, enjoying the ride while simultaneously appreciating the view from March.
“I don’t think they think about it as much as the coaching staff or the people around,” Crutchfield said. “They just go show up and play. They’ve been really locked in and really focused on this one. I expect the same thing on Thursday night.”

author: djy
title: 消息：華為芯片不力 DeepSeek新模型推遲發布
text:
【大紀元2025年08月14日訊】（大紀元記者王君宜綜合報導）最新消息指出，中國人工智能新創公司DeepSeek（深度求索）因在使用華為芯片進行訓練時遭遇技術故障，被迫推遲最新R2模型的發布。此事凸顯北京在推進本土化AI發展方面仍面臨嚴峻挑戰。
據《金融時報》引述三位知情人士透露，DeepSeek在今年1月推出R1模型後，應監管部門「鼓勵」，改用華為昇騰（Ascend）處理器取代美國英偉達（Nvidia，輝達）系統。
但在R2訓練過程中，昇騰芯片反覆出現穩定性與性能問題，最終DeepSeek只能採取「訓練用英偉達、推理用華為」的折衷方案，原定5月的發布被迫延後，錯失市場時機。
訓練是指通過大量數據讓模型學習並優化參數的過程；推理則是利用已完成訓練的模型生成結果或預測，例如聊天機器人的回覆。
報導稱，華為曾派遣工程師團隊駐紮DeepSeek辦公室協助開發，但仍未能在昇騰芯片上完成一次成功的完整訓練。DeepSeek仍在與華為合作，嘗試讓R2模型在推理階段完全適配昇騰芯片。
知情人士表示，DeepSeek創辦人梁文峰對R2研發進度不滿，並推動加大資源投入，以打造能保持領先優勢的先進模型。
英偉達H20在華發展情勢
英偉達近日與美國政府達成協議，同意將其H20芯片在華銷售收入的15%上繳美方，以換取出口許可。該公司強調，若完全退出中國市場及開發者社群，將削弱美國的全球經濟競爭力與科技影響力。
然而，中共網信辦上月末約談英偉達，要求解釋H20芯片是否存在可遠端追蹤或關閉的「後門」安全風險，並提交相關證明材料。
英偉達於8月6日發表聲明，明確否認旗下GPU芯片含有後門功能、遙控關機開關或間諜軟件。
路透社報導指出，中共當局雖未正式全面禁止H20銷售，但已明令要求騰訊、字節跳動、百度等主要網絡企業在使用H20時需提交「合理說明」，尤其涉及政府或敏感用途時。
報導指出，儘管中國市場仍對H20有需求，持續的政治與監管壓力可能促使企業減少採購量。
責任編輯：李琳#
topics: Science and Technology->information technology and computer science
Economy, Business and Finance->computing and information technology

author: gambader
title: #45 La salud mental de los jóvenes empeora: está entrando en una fase peligrosa según los expertos
text:
[Grahml](/user/Grahml)a [ondacero.es](/go/link/3969108)
Con un 27 % de paro juvenil.
Una edad de salida de casa de los padres de un promedio de 30 años.
Los que consiguen trabajar es con contratos temporales o medias jornadas.
Salarios de mierda.
Con títulos que no les sirven.
Alquileres por las nubes.
Conozco el tema.
Lo raro sería que tuvieran buena salud mental.
[#8](c8#c-8) Añade algunas cosas aún más importantes:
1. Follan cada vez menos y peor. Todo el pescado se lo comen entre cuatro y a los demás no les caen ni las raspucias.
2. Las redes sociales les han vuelto adictos al vender imagen y al culto al cuerpo. A la hora de la verdad no tienen amigos ni saben lo que es eso.
3. La pandemia les trastornó la vida de mala manera.
4. Ya no pueden tener coche ni los que viven en un pueblo escarpado.
5. Ya sólo pueden consumir cosas usadas en Vinted y Wallapop.
6. Si se refugian en el monte lo encuentran reventado y hecho un secarral lleno de domingueros. Si apuestan por el sector primario es aún más inviable que todos los demás.
7. El turismo lo mismo les echa de sus propios barrios.
8. Correos es su mula e Internet su camello. Tienen barra libre de unas drogas brutales sobre las que nadie sabe ni quiere saber una mierda.
9. La desinformación se los come vivos cuando todavía no les han enseñado a contrastar datos y cotejar relatos, terminan no entendiendo el mundo ni por asomo.
10. Votan al salvapatrias más troll que pillan porque sólo quieren ver el mundo arder y encima les critican por ello.
[#8](c8#c-8) y luego viene el boomer a decirte "si, pero tenéis iphones y nosotros no teíamos"
La generación más egoísta de la historia.
[#36](c36#c-36) Gracias Mister por el voto positivo, pero resulta que yo soy boomer.
Es mejor no generalizar (yo a veces también caigo en ello) porque no todos los boomers somos egoístas, como puedes deducir por mi comentario.
Empatizo mucho con los jóvenes, y además tengo un hijo en esas circunstancias laborales y vitales.
Un saludo.
[#7](c7#c-7) no se entiende cómo las guerras hacen fuerte a la gente. Es sencillo: los débiles mueren, los fuertes sobreviven. La media del resultado es más fuerte que la media original.
[#1](c1#c-1) Yo lo achacaria mas bien al abuso de redes sociales. Pasar varias horas al día viendo tiktok, instagram y demás, pasa factura
[#19](c19#c-19) Si los adolescentes pre-profesionales ya están mal, cuando vean que no pueden continuar con el tren de vida que me llevan y que yo al menos veo, con cubatrones y pintxitos de calamares, salir a comer el finde con la paga, y viajecitos en avión (seguramente imitando el falso lujo de otros en rrss) o simplemente arrancar su vida independiente, la hostia va a ser mayúscula.
[#19](c19#c-19) nah, es por la sobreprotección, esta feo ver a un joven sufrir o estresarse y a la larga da problemas
Es muy complicado solucionarlo
[#19](c19#c-19) Es mucho peor todavía.
Suben a Instagram vídeos de Reguetón grabados con Autotune que distribuyen por Tiktok.
[#10](c10#c-10) o mirar el mundo de mierda que les estamos dejando
Precisamente , no se molestan mucho en cambiarlo, sin una juventud reaccionaria a la condición humana le quedan cuatro telediarios en el planeta
[#11](c11#c-11) En cuanto nos estalle la WWIII ya veras como se estabilizan las enfermedades mentales de los jóvenes
[#11](c11#c-11) tampoco es asi, pobres chavales...
Tenemos un mundo montado en torno a la gente de mediana edad, que es la mayoría demografica, y les estamos dejando fuera.
Para muestra, un botón. Ahora, en la series/peliculas/programas las actrices buenorras que siempre ha habido no son veinteañeras. Son cuarentonas todas.
Y asi con todo.
Pobre juventud... Y maldita suerte los que han vivido una adolescencia con redes sociales... Cosa que me alegro de no haber conocido a tan tierna edad
[#6](c6#c-6) Me temo que has dado en el clavo. Del mismo modo deberíamos conocer qué les lleva a estos actuar de formas en cierto modo imprudentes con sus hijos (dejarles móviles desde bebés, jugar a consolas a juegos agresivos, crear conflictos, etc.) y llegaríamos a varias conclusiones.
Resumiendo, la historia en nuestro país es delicada, así como intereses económicos que lo desestabilizan todo.
[#3](c3#c-3) siento el negativo, esto no es digno del ciencia
https://www.thelancet.com/commissions/youth-mental-health
https://www.thelancet.com/pb-assets/Lancet/stories/commissions/youth-mental-health/policy-1723555044810.pdf
[#15](c15#c-15) perdona que no he podido meterte el otro link https://www.thelancet.com/pb-assets/Lancet/stories/commissions/youth-mental-health/policy-1723555044810.pdf (curro, sorry. Y copie el otro dos veces. Pero me tenía que ir)
Nah, sin problemas. Sabes que si me gusta algo te lo voto, yo no voy por ahí de vengador, ni nada parecido (además de que subes cosas chulas)
Es que… fíjate si respeto el Ciencia que, creo, nunca he subido nada a él
Salu2!
Antes de que la salud mental de los jóvenes se deteriore se ha deteriorado la educación que han recibido. Tanto en la familia como en los centros de formación.
No sólo mental. Cosas como la escoliosis que en mis tiempos pasaba con personas que hacían grandes esfuerzos físicos, ahora la tienen chavales de ciudad.
[#2](c2#c-2) Eso no tiene sentido. Yo tengo escoliosis desde los 12 años y mi prima hasta tuvo que llevar corsé mucho tiempo. Ya me dirás tú qué esfuerzos físicos hicimos.
Es normal, cada vez vivimos en condiciones más inhumanas. Las redes sociales no son el habitad natural del ser humano, tampoco lo son las grandes ciudades de cemento, ni la interconexión de información global que te hace preocuparte de cosas que pasan a 5000 km. Añadir a eso el coste de vida, ideologías modernas y el retroceso en estándares de vida.
No os preocupéis. Esto son solo pataletas de juventud. No debe parecerles a los jóvenes proletarios vasallos españoles que la precariedad, la pobreza y el subdesarrollo en que sus propios padres les han hecho nacer sean circunstancias tan horribles, si arden en deseos y defienden como un derecho el poder hacer nacer también, y criar, a sus propias proles en ellas, a que sus proles también reciban en herencia y les agradezcan, en forma de pensiones, esa pobreza, esa precariedad, ese subdesarrollo, ese capitalismo, esa monarquía y ese Reino de España tanto como ellos, los jóvenes proletarios vasallos españoles, los agradecen a sus padres, en la misma forma de pensiones.
Desde esta perspectiva, tener hijos es la manera mas clara y evidente (mas incluso que meter una papeleta en una urna) en que una persona puede mostrar su aprobación favorable del entorno económico o de las condiciones económicas en que dicha persona hace nacer a esos hijos. Pues ¿qué persona ética e inteligente haría nacer a sus propios hijos en un determinado entorno o circunstancia económica si considerase que ese entorno o circunstancia económica es horrible? ( Las proles, pues, son las papeletas electorales más rotundas, y por tanto las que más ambiciona el capitalismo, capitalismo que no existe gracias a los capitalistas, sino gracias a los proletarios ).
Y es que el libro de los gustos está en blanco, y la convivencia en una sociedad civilizada debe consistir en que sepamos respetarnos los unos a los otros las costumbres, culturas, derechos, preferencias económicas, criterios progenitores y principios éticos de cada cual, aunque puedan ser muy diferentes a los nuestros.
El que es pobre es porque quiere votar capitalismo, monarquía y pobreza, con sus votos y con su prole.
Si los proletarios vasallos españoles quieren arreglar la economía con más proles y con más proletarios vasallos en vez de con menos capitalismo y con menos monarquía, están en su derecho, en su costumbre y en su cultura, y se los tenemos que respetar.
Así que no creo que este sea un problema que no pueda solucionarse poniéndole un par de medallas más a Leonor.
El Reino de España, pues, va bien y está bien como está, y la precariedad, la pobreza, el subdesarrollo, el capitalismo y la monarquía son cultura, costumbres, modas, tendencias, derechos, libertades, preferencias, elecciones, votos e hijos de los proletarios vasallos españoles, y se los tienen que respetar así como ellos, los proletarios vasallos españoles, también respetan las costumbres y culturas ajenas.
Así que no permitáis, jóvenes proletarios vasallos españoles, que estas noticias aporófobas desvíen vuestra atención y vuestra ética: no renunciéis a pegaros el gustazo de generar otro baby boom para hacer nacer a vuestras proles en la pobreza o la precariedad, y entregarlas al capitalismo y a la monarquía. Porque la natalidad y las pensiones lo necesitan, y porque aunque en un primer momento quizá podría pareceros mal hacer nacer a vuestras propias proles en la pobreza o en la precariedad, cuando vuestras proles alcancen la mayoría de edad también se volverán defensoras del derecho de hacer nacer a sus propias proles en la pobreza, en la precariedad, en el capitalismo y en la monarquía, a que estos hijos suyos (vuestros nietos) les agradezcan todas estas cosas, en forma de pensiones, tanto como vuestras proles os las agradecerán a vosotros, en forma de pensiones, y tanto como vosotros las agradecéis a vuestros padres, en la misma forma. Así que no hay ningún problema con que hagáis nacer a vuestras proles en la pobreza, en la precariedad, en el subdesarrollo, en el capitalismo y en la monarquía, porque vuestras proles os lo agradecerán, en forma de pensiones.
La cultura es la verdadera riqueza, así que dejad en herencia a vuestras proles la rica cultura de la pobreza.
No creáis, pues, a nadie que os diga que hay una guerra económica o lucha de clases, ya sea a nivel intrageneracional o a nivel intergeneracional.
Y recordad que cuando hacéis nacer a vuestras propias proles en la pobreza y la precariedad, no serán los ricos, el capitalismo y la monarquía los que se estén riendo de vosotros, sino que seréis vosotros los que os estaréis riendo de ellos.
Y no dejéis de ponerle medallas a Leonor. Recordad que cuantas más medallas les pongáis a los Borbones, mejor os irá el Reino de España a vosotros, es decir, a ellos, a los Borbones.
ostras es que el comite de expertos estan super al loro. Igual algun dia se van a dar cuenta si es que pueden distinguir entre los generos que hay ahora que el 75% de los suicidios son chavales. Y el dia (que yo creo esta cerca) que descubran que el agua moja habra que celebrarlo volviendo a la Luna en el ascensor lunar
Después de leer un montón de mamadas libertarias y anticapitalistas y que si cambio climático tampoco os emocionéis tanto. Que según vuestros argumentos nuestros abuelos tendrían unos niveles de estres invivibles, ni te cuento siglos atrás. Lo que no tuvieron nuestros abuelos ni antes son putas redes sociales por ejemplo. Y si la respuesta que hemos dado a una epidemia de ansiedad es no te preocupes por nada niño que yo te quito de el medio todo lo que te moleste... pues ahí vamos. La DOPAMINE ha contaminado la BIOLOGY
¡CHORRADAS! Nuestra salud mental es excelente. Es más, estoy tan exultante que me atrevido a soñar con mi propia raza de superhombres atómicos -de cuerpos octogonales- capaces de chuparle la sangre a ...

author: Kamal Sultan For Dailymail.Com
title: Biden administration threatens to SUE Texas if it allows local cops to arrest, jail and prosecute migrants flooding across the border illegally | Daily Mail Online
text: The Biden administration has threatened to sue Texas if it allows police officers to arrest, jail and prosecute migrants who are crossing the border from Mexico . Texas Governor Greg Abbott signed a new law on December 18 which allows for local and state law enforcement to arrest and deport illegal border crossers without going through federal government channels. But the Justice Department has warned it will file a lawsuit in protest of the bill , known as SB4, if the state did not provide assurances to federal officials by January 3 that it would refrain from enforcing it, according to CBS News. A letter was sent to Governor Abbot on December 28 which said the new law would criminalize already illegal actions, undermine relations with Mexico and stop officials from enforcing federal immigration laws. It comes after border officials recorded the highest number of migrant crossings ever with a seven-day average of more than 9,600 in December. The Biden administration has threatened to sue Texas if it allows police officers to arrest, jail and prosecute migrants who are crossing the border from Mexico Texas Governor Greg Abbott signed a new law on December 18 which allows for local and state law enforcement to arrest and deport illegal border crossers without going through federal government channels But the Justice Department has warned it will file a lawsuit against the bill, known as SB4, if the state did not provide assurances to federal officials by January 3 that it would refrain from enforcing it, according to CBS News The letter sent by the Justice Department threatens legal action over the bill signed by Republican Abbott which he says could slash the number of crossings by up to three quarters as illegal entries continue to rise through the winter. 'Because SB 4 is unconstitutional and will disrupt the federal government's operations, we request that Texas forbear in its enforcement,' Principal Deputy Assistant Attorney General Brian Boynton wrote. He added that if the state did not back down 'the United States intends to file suit to enjoin the enforcement of SB 4'. Democrats in El Paso County and two immigration rights groups have already launched legal action against the bill and argue it is unconstitutional. The lawsuit argues that the federal government and immigration agencies have the ultimate and exclusive authority to carry out arrests, detentions and deportations – and that Abbott cannot circumvent these procedures. They claim that the law violates the Constitution and claim it invites racial profiling of Hispanic citizens. SB4 would be the strictest state immigration law in modern US history and gives Texas law enforcement authorities power to stop, arrest and jail migrants on newly established state-level illegal entry charges. State judges in Texas will also be able to issue de facto deportations against suspected violators of the law. Texas Governor Abbott signed into law sweeping new powers that allows police to arrest migrants who cross the border illegally and gives local judges authority to order them to leave the country A migrant caravan, 6,000-8,000 people strong, making its way through Southern Mexico bound for the US on Christmas Eve Thousands of migrants spent Christmas Eve in camps and shelters in south and central Chihuahua. Many of them are now on the move toward Juarez and the US border Entering the US illegally from Mexico could be treated as a misdemeanor, under the new bill, and would be punishable by up to 180 days in jail as well as a fine of up to $2,000. While illegally reentering the country would be a felony and could lead to a sentence of up to 2, 10 or 20 years in jail, depending on criminal history. It's not immediately clear how the law will be enforced or how it will work with federal authorities – like Customs and Border Patrol and Immigration and Customs Enforcement – also operating within Texas and other border states. New video has revealed the human tidal wave of migrants riding trains in northern Mexico just hours away from the US border- as thousands of migrants in a caravan are traveling through southern Mexico. Separately, thousands more asylum-seekers are already in Northern Mexico waiting to cross over. In Chihuahua, a Mexican state just south of Texas, about 800 migrants left the capital city Christmas day headed for Juarez-- the Mexican town directly across the international boundary from El Paso, Texas, according to the Border Report. Families including young children waded across the Rio Grande from Mexico and scaled barbed-wire fences all through the night and more once the sun came up After immediately surrendering to border agents, once they could find the overworked officers, to claim asylum, they were herded into pens by the hundreds Thousands of migrants wrapped in silver thermal blankets, many hoping to seek asylum in the US, are gathered under a bridge in Eagle Pass, Texas, waiting for their chance to surrender to the US Border Patrol Long lines of migrants have been using 'space blankets' to brave the elements. Once on the US side, border crossers are waiting in a makeshift staging camp in Eagle Pass set up by the Border Patrol. Because they numbers are so great, it is taking federal agents days to screen migrants who entered the US Footage showed hundreds a top a train heading north while cars honked and cheered as they drove past the train cars. Another 3,000 migrants are a few hours south in the town of Jimenez in a migrant camp. It could be just a matter of days before the South and Central American asylum-seekers arrive at the US-Mexico border and begin attempting to cross into West Texas. There is nowhere for the migrants who cross in Eagle Pass to go and they have been forced to sleep in makeshift camps and shelters. They have been spotted patiently waiting for their turn to be processed, and were wrapped in 'space blankets' - sheets of foil commonly seen after marathons that effectively retain heat. El Paso has sent 139 buses to Chicago in recent months with the help of state officials, according to the City of El Paso's migrant dashboard. Last week, the Texas Division of Emergency Management or TDEM, which handles migrant transports, chartered its first flight with migrants to Chicago to avoid growing restrictions over when and where migrants can be dropped off.
